EmailTemplate.name: FW: Thomas, David French Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (13559326
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Thomas, David French Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners (1355932604.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Standard Template - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Thomas, Nice to meet you via email. David let me know you may be reaching out, please disregard the email from Nicolette Taylor below and consider me your main point of contact. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Wednesday, December 19, 2012 10:54 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: FW: Thomas, David French Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Wednesday, December 19, 2012 10:53 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Thomas, David French Thought You May Be Interested In MBO Partners To view this email as a web page, click here <http://info.mbopartners.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> Dear Thomas, Ive been using MBO for some time and thought you might be interested in their services too. Check them out when you get a second. David French We received your contact information from David French, a current member of MBO Partners who believes you could greatly benefit from our program. My name is Nicolette Taylor, a Consultant Services Advisor, and I invite you to learn what MBO Partners is all about <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=David%20French&re=Thomas&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>, and decide for yourself. For more than 25 years, our company has led the independent consulting sector in America. Our mission is simple we make it easy for independent consultants and their clients to work together by handling the administrative, financial, legal, tax and expense burdens that bog down consultants, thus increasing their billable time. In addition, we provide them access to the largest exclusive online community of successful independent consultants, the clients that engage with them, and a multitude of valuable resources. Click here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program/why-mbo?r=David%20French&re=Thomas&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> to learn more about what MBO Partners can do for independent consultants. Here are some recent tools we have developed to empower our consultants to thrive in their independent careers that you might find useful: - Bill Rate Packet <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D#billrate>  Not sure what to bill your clients? This tool will assist you, factoring in your desired profit margins, expected expenses, and projected insurance costs. - Webinar Index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?type=presentation&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>  Learn from industry experts advising on best practices to help you expand your consulting business. - Meet the Independents <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>  Get a glimpse into the independent workforce in America by reading the profiles and stories of some of our consultants. - Independents Guide <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>  Take advantage of an online library of articles and resources covering a myriad of topics and issues geared specifically towards the independent career path.
You may also wish to sign-up for our monthly Independent Consulting Brief <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mpages/ch-2012-04-01/ic-newsletter.html?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost&utm_campaign=ICB%2B-%2BMZ%2BTwitter%2BPost&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> to stay up to date on the many resources that we provide to the consulting marketplace. I wish you every success in growing or starting your own independent consulting business, and if youd like to set up a time to talk to learn more, please feel free to schedule a time <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> that is convenient for you to speak with me. Regards, ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6281 f: 703-793-6070 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTUzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTE4MjAzMzQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMDkxMjcmZW1haWxpZD1udGF5bG9yQG1ib3BhcnRuZXJzLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMzEzMTItMTM2Mjc5OS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://info.mbopartners.com/SubscriptionManagement.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvqjAZKXonjHpfsX56OovXq6%2FlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ARMtnI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D></body
